about_the_game:
Go to various haunted sites and photograph the ghosts. What you do is simple.

The photographer player, however, is not only taking pictures, but also aiming for the best shot of the ghost.

The goal is to find the moving ghost by its presence, to get closer to it, to center it, and if possible, to look at it from the camera's point of view!

Will the ghosts be patient enough to let you take pictures of them?

・The game starts in the first-person perspective.

・Keyboard and mouse controls are used.

・Headset recommended.

Special note

・The photos you take will be saved in the save folder on your computer. Please note that depending on the camera's image quality settings, the game may take up a lot of space.

・You are free to upload the photos you take to the Internet.

・We will not be held responsible for any unexpected effects that may occur as a result of playing the game.

・This game contains flashing lights.

　If you are sensitive to light, please stop the game and consult a doctor if you feel any physical problems.

・There are no restrictions on video distribution. Monetization is also not a problem. We hope you enjoy playing!

Android AR version coming soon!　Find and photograph ghosts at home!
